code: import{useState,createRef,useEffect}from"react";import axios from'axios';import"./Notifications.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Notifications=_ref=>{let{url}=_ref;const[festiveList,setFestiveList]=useState("");const loadFestiveNotifications=async()=>{let businessType=JSON.parse(window.sessionStorage.getItem('user-profile')).businessType;let festiveArr=[];let month=new Date().getMonth()+1;let day=new Date().getDate();axios.get("/notif-config/".concat(businessType)).then(function(response){if(response.data!='auth by ",item.date]})]});})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"new-notif",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{id:"pTitle",type:"text",placeholder:"Title"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{id:"pDesc",placeholder:"Description"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{class:"footer-buttons",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{onClick:sendNotif,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Send"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{class:"fas
